summary: After his involuntary retirement, Jesse Stone investigates the suspicious death of a young friend while the Paradise police force deals with the arrogant new chief, who is the son-in-law of a town councilman.
cast: Tom Selleck|Kathy Baker|Kohl Sudduth|Gloria Reuben|Stephen McHattie|William Sadler|Mark Blum|Eileen Boylan|Mike Erwin|Jeff Geddis|Rae Ritke|Kerri Smith|Val Ovtcharov|Stacy Smith|Saul Rubinek|William Devane|Jeremy Akerman|Christine Tizzard|Dylan Roberts|Benjamin Charles Watson|Molly Dunsworth|Hans Bogild|Laura Kohoot|Mike Cleven|Christopher Killam|Vanessa Furlong|Gil Anderson|Joe the Dog
keywords: gym|swimming|shot multiple times|pump action shotgun|night vision goggles
title: Jesse Stone: Inocentes perdidos
